basic_01_greatest.title: Greatest of Two Numbers
basic_01_greatest.description: Find the greatest of two integers.

basic_02_leap.title: Leap Year Check
basic_02_leap.description: Check whether a given year is a leap year. A year is leap if divisible by 4 but not by 100, or divisible by 400.

sample_cases.explanation: 2020 is divisible by 4 and not by 100, so it's a leap year.

basic_03_fibonacci.title: Fibonacci Series
basic_03_fibonacci.description: Print first n numbers of the Fibonacci series starting with 0 and 1.

sample_cases.explanation: Fibonacci sequence: 0,1, next numbers are sum of previous two: 1,2,3.

basic_04_reverse.title: Reverse a Number
basic_04_reverse.description: Reverse the digits of a given number.

basic_05_gcd_lcm.title: GCD and LCM
basic_05_gcd_lcm.description: Calculate GCD and LCM of two numbers without using inbuilt functions. GCD is the largest number dividing both, LCM = (a*b)/GCD.

array_01_count_even.title: Count Even Numbers
array_01_count_even.description: Count the number of even elements in an array.

sample_cases.explanation: Even numbers are 2, 4, and 6, total count = 3.

array_02_min.title: Minimum Element in Array
array_02_min.description: Find the minimum element in an array.

sample_cases.explanation: Compare all elements, 1 is the smallest.

array_03_check_sorted.title: Check if Array is Sorted
array_03_check_sorted.description: Check whether the array is sorted in non-decreasing order.

sample_cases.explanation: Each element is <= next element, so array is sorted.

array_04_freq_element.title: Frequency of an Element
array_04_freq_element.description: Count how many times a given element occurs in an array.

sample_cases.explanation: 2 appears three times in the array.

array_05_subarray_sum.title: Subarray with Given Sum
array_05_subarray_sum.description: Find a continuous subarray whose sum equals the given sum. Output start and end indices (1-based). If none, output -1.

ll_01_search.title: Search in Linked List
ll_01_search.description: Search an element in a linked list and report if it exists.

ll_02_middle_node.title: Middle Node of Linked List
ll_02_middle_node.description: Find the middle node of a linked list. If even number of nodes, return the second middle node.

ll_03_reverse_k.title: Reverse Linked List in Groups of K
ll_03_reverse_k.description: Reverse a linked list in groups of given size k. If remaining nodes < k, leave them as is.

sample_cases.explanation: First group 1,2 reversed to 2,1; second group 3,4 reversed to 4,3; last node 5 remains.

ll_04_delete_nth.title: Delete Nth Node from End
ll_04_delete_nth.description: Delete the Nth node from the end of linked list.

sample_cases.explanation: 2nd node from end is 4, removed from list.

ll_05_detect_loop.title: Detect and Remove Loop
ll_05_detect_loop.description: Detect a loop in linked list and remove it. If no loop, list remains same.

sample_cases.explanation: Loop starting at node 3 is removed, original list restored.
